content.detailedDescription:
It was the late summer 1991 and i was with my girlfriend (future wife), her father and step mother in leland, mi spending the weekend at a small resort.
my gf and i had gone for a walk north along the beach of lake michigan.  we walked a couple hundred yards up the beach and stopped to sit and talk and take it all in.  it was getting near dusk but still well lit.  while sitting on the beach i noticed something strange.  there was a cloud that seemed out of place.  it was much lower than any other cloud in the sky and moving steadily along in a southern direction.  i just remember thinking to myself that this was very out of place and i kept looking at it without telling my gf.  the cloud was triangular shaped or v-shaped with sides between 50 to 100 feet long.  i guess it was probably at less than 300 ft. altitude and likely lower.  again it seemed out of place and the altitude was significant to me.  it was just a short time later that my gf told me she felt and saw the same thing independent of me.  well after a few more minutes we decided to walk back up to the house the family was renting.  as we approached the house (which had a west facing deck looking out over lake michigan) my gf's father was yelling "get up here there are ufo's out there."  i instantly had a shudder through my body and i knew what i had seen.  he and his wife had both been on the deck when they described as the same cloud like, v-shaped object we had just seen minutes earlier.  we rushed up to the deck and my father in law said, "this shape just came out of a cloud and rushed out over the lake.  you can see it out there now."  at that moment he pointed out what he believed to be the object and said there was more than one, possibly three.  as i watched with him i did see distant shapes move laterally and vertically on the horizon.  objects also appeared to fade in and out.  we watched for several minutes.  my mother in law was freaked and she went inside visibly shaken.  i was getting shook up too and didn't want to see anymore either.  by then the sun was setting and there was nothing along the horizon other than clouds.  i cannot be sure what i saw on the horizon but i do know what my gf and i saw while on the beach and i am very sure my father and mother in law saw what they described.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: With family in leland, mi late summer 1991 saw triangular shaped cloud that moved overhead then zoomed west

content.detailedDescription: This event happened back in 1993 to us ; cant remember the exact date but it was in 1993. we (my husband and i ); we werent married then. we were engaged. we had just laid down to go to sleep. it was around 11:00 pm- 12:00am. all of  a sudden a bright light appeared at the bedroom window by our bed. we both got up and looked out the window thru the blinds but saw nothing, no sound or anything. then the light went away. we laid back down after that. as i was laying there ; all of a sudden ;it was like i was paralyzed and couldnt move. it was like i was being held down by the legs;arms;head, & body. i was still awake when this was happening. all i could move was my eyes. i tried to scream to my husband but i couldnt do that. we had a night light on in the room so i could see clearly everything that was going on. i saw one walking to his side of the bed at that time. i was so  frightened at what was happening to me. i could see my husband; he could not move either. i was trying to look around the room. all i could move was my eyes. i saw 4-5 small in stature alien type  beings; light greyish in color with big dark eyes;small mouth/nose; big head ;long arms/fingers. .They were around 3-4 ft. tall. there was two to three at the end of the bed. i saw one walking to the side of my husbands bed; looking at him. then one came to my side and was looking at me ; tilting its head but not saying anything. it looked at the other ones at the end of bed and looked back at me. i was trying to scream but could not.I was watching it. then it touched my head & face. i dont remember anything else after that. there was a loss of over hours when we woke the next morning. i and my husband had unusually clear type secretions coming from our belly buttons for days after this encounter. at the same time my youngest son was 5 years . he had told me that next day that  a monster was looking at him in bed. we had all went to bed about the same time. so i dont know if they took him or not; but he had similiar secretions from his belly button for days.  he was scared when he told me. he wouldnt  sleep in his room after that for a while when he saw the monster as he called. we never told anyone til now. we didnt know who to tell or if anyone would believe us. but its the truth; so we are telling it now. thanks for letting me tell about our encounter. to this day i still see ufo objects near our property. at night ; we both hear things on our roof in the living room area . usually around 10:00 pm; up to times of 4:00 am. i have tried to capture what it is; thats jumping up on our roof.  its walking across the roof outside but have not captured photos of it yet. we have a add-on to our mobile home with metal roof/ no attic so we can hear it clearly. its like something walks across to where either one of us is sitting and stops. we have turned the tv off and listened to it ;but then it stops ; like it knows we are listening to it. i and my husband have run out to the front to see if we can see what it is. we can still hear it walking then it stops. but we cant see it. so i dont know what it is. but its there. its no animals; thats what we thought at first but its getting more frequent the last few months. i look at my husband when i hear it; and he says he hears it too. so what it is ; dont know. but it frightens me sometimes when i am in the living room by myself sometimes. i hear it jump on the roof and walks on the metal above ; like to where i am sitting on the couch. so what it is ;dont know. its not a animal ;know that because we have went outside before right when we heard it to see what it is; nothing there. it stops moving when we did that. as soon as we went back in ;it would run and sounded like it would jump back off roof. so something watches us. we wanted to know what is going on about what happened to us and why this is still happening. this is what is happening now and what happened to us previously.
content.summary: Lights brightened in the window/looked out/ after laying back down in bed/ saw 4-5 alien figures by our bed

content.detailedDescription:
While returning from an evening walk at about 7:30 pm in mid march 2011, not long after the nuclear disaster in japan. as i rounded a corner off of elm st. i looked back down that street to suddenly see appear a star bright object, mercury vapor bright in color. burning bright and wavering, throwing out almost tangible color. i found myself back in the street i had just left, not knowing how long or how i had come back into the road i had just left. the object is brilliant now and is changing colors like a slide show backlit by lasers. it is beautiful. i can't make out a definite shape. it seems to be changing shapes with the colors it throws into the environment. the light has substance. i can feel it as it strobes and changes intensities. then, in my head i feel, not so much a voice as an overwhelming impression. it is here for me and it says so. it is performing these light and shape changes for my enjoyment while it,,,,gets ready to get me. i suddenly have the feeling something is behind me.
there in the road behind me is a car, with a man at the wheel. gripping the steering wheel with both hands. he is just staring. i can see the flashes of light reflecting off his face and the windshield. i look back at the object above the road and it is now about half again as close as it was. just like that, it has come that much closer, and the odd thing is that it's aspect has not changed. i didn't realize it was so large. it continues to flash outlandish colors and is now putting on a full blown show of shape changes that defy a machine description. what is this?
now i turn and the car is in the drive way of the house i've been standing in front of. the man is out leaning over the top of the car, he's tall and still just staring. i approach him and he is stiff as a board. when i look back to the object it is again half again closer to us. i feel the object as it goes on with the colors and shape changes. it is unbelievably beautiful. it beckons, calls to my head with something i understand. it wanted to take me on a journey, but now? i look at the man and he is paralyzed stiff. i wonder at his condition and am half turned to him and the object.  pointing i yell out do you see that? he makes nothing. nothing. glazed over, staring. i reach out and take his head in my hands and point his head right at the object. and he just about falls over going relaxed on me!
then he just looks right at me and says deadpan, yah, i see it. i've always seen it. at that moment i realize he has been literally scared stiff or completely terrified!
 and now as i look back from the reflections of brilliance in his eyes, the object/entity is in the trees next door and i now realize it is really big there. and it is beyond descriptions now. changing into a ring there in the trees above us. i get an overwhelming "communication" that says we are going now and they can't stop for me with the other guy there. i yelled out to him they're going and grabbed his arm, running up under this object that has now become a burning silver ring above us. the ring is hissing now. the only sound it's made is this hissing right now. i feel it more than hear it. it is now a brilliant deep orange ring above the trees. the center has become the deepest violet/black with red shocks streaming from top to bottom as the ring is standing on end in the trees not laying down flat. it is alive i feel. i'm not certain what it is, but it seems to be a life of some kind. and now it is going. it is gone. appears to be gone, over the horizon while still there  in the trees for some odd reason. the man says how far do you think it is? and i say a long way. and the there is a clap, a boom and it is good and really gone.
the man looked at me and just says, do you think we should report this?  
i tried to report it, but that didn't go so well, so i just said to hell with it. tried to report it to davenport at reporting center, but that didn't go well. it was too complex to get over to him i guess. at least in the format they used then. i haven't reported since trying then.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Cigar,   Cone,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cross,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle
content.summary: object appeared 3 blocks from me hovering above the road. while observing a driver approached  the rear, appeared hypnotized

content.detailedDescription: This was a strange event,i got a letter in the mail that i was to receive a free camera,all i had to do was show up at a specific address at a specific time and date. note: this was a long time ago back in the early 90's.The location was in el monte california,so me and my brother decided to go.Upon arriving at the exact location we noticed that the address where we were led to was a vacant lot. we thought okay this was obviously a hoax,but to what end?,we were also very hungry and decided to go to the burger king across the street,it was here where the event took place.My brother told me what he wanted and i stood in line,about four people in front of me then this guy walks in who to me looked like a bum,dirty,cut off gloves,long brownish coat.And he got behind me and i remember looking at my brother and over to the cashier girl who also noticed this man.I feared he was going to ask for money,i expected it.Instead he leans over and taps my shoulder and i turn to him and he asks me or rather questions me.He says "you really don't know what time it is do you?,you don't know what 145 is? i turned around back towards the line and now the few people in front of me as well as the cashier girl noticed him and then all of they're faces turned to shock,i thought he maybe pulled out a knife or a gun,but instead what they witnessed was he simply vanished... i quickly turned behind me and he was gone without a trace,the lobby door just feet away stood still,he couldn't have made it out without one of us seeing him do so.Now comes even the weirder part.By the time i reached the front of the line everyone including myself forgot what transpired just a few minutes earlier.This incident wasn't my first either concerning the number 145,and every time i encountered a human looking being,the situation was the same,they questioned me about the time,and 145.Now honestly to me i have no idea the significance of this number,i was wondering if anyone else had ever experienced anything similar?
content.summary: It was an entity,diquised as a human being.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out star gazing on march 31 2013 in the field next to my place. i was viewing north with my nikon binoculars, a hand light w/strobe and a green and a blue star pointer ready. as i was looking near the big dipper's handle an object appeared moving from ne to nw. the object "faded" into being and after viewing an orange sphere/orb in my binocs, illuminated it with my laser. the object immediately got very bright and flashed/strobed once. then there was a second object that immediately appeared/faded into being below and trailing. this object then brightened and flashed like the first as another object appeared and flashed also, above and trailing farther behind both the others, forming a large triangle. i used my laser to illuminate the third object and then all three strobed/flashed at once seemingly from the objects centers. like a black point had formed and strobed out but light flashed off them, too. they all then dimmed and were gone while moving through the big dipper's handle.
a few minutes after this, three objects flew over my position from different directions. one flying west to east, one flying ne to sw in a curving path and the last from east to west.
my reaction has become one of excited expectation after having witnessed this type of display numerous times. i recently obtained a new computer and will now take time to report.
content.summary: A group of three separately appearing objects traveling through big dipper flashed and blinked in response to lasers

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from easter my wife and i saw a glowing object swoop down to the north of us. i continue driving after couple seconds it disappeared then after another brief second there was a flash over the horizon. the flash was brief but light up a good portion of the sky. it flew in a northern direction and appeared to be egg or oval shaped. it appeared to be dark in color but had a glowing whitish light.
content.summary: Object with glowing light swooped down then dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from dropping my daughter off at school and turned right on to canton from shallowford around 7:50 in the morning. this is a daily route. i looked up in the sky and noticed 2 planes going in opposing directions. there are always planes in the sky around this time of morning and you can see their trails. it was a sunny morning with clear skies. i suddenly noticed, between the two planes, a silver object in the sky, almost tin like, with an oval shape but not as elongated or perfect, almost as if it was squished but not a circle, it was wide though and gave a mishapen appearance and there was a darkness on the right side of the belly. it was much lower than the planes but i have no clue on distance so couldn't say how high. i was like, 'what in the world is that?!" it was much bigger and much closer than the 2 planes and seemed to be moving somewhat to the left but not really much at all as i noticed the 2 planes growing further from it. i was driving and had to put my eyes on the road and my turn was coming up so i got over in the turning lane and stopped to see it more. i just stared at it trying to figure out what it was and comparing it to the 2 planes. i then looked left to make a turn and looked back up and it was gone. very odd! i kept looking and saw the other 2 planes but not the object again.  not sure what it was. i so wish i could have looked longer at it. it seemed so close and so shiny, like tin or silver had just been polished and it gave the appearance that it was just sitting there. i don't think the sighting lasted more than 30 seconds. i'm so curious what it was and if anyone else saw it! there is a lot of traffic around that time.
content.summary: Silver shiny object floating in sky near canton and shallowford in marietta/woodstock, ga

content.detailedDescription: On the night in question a friend and i decided to go see a movie at the local drive-in in the wicksburg area, we arrived at 7:30pm. we parked facing south-se to view the movie. at approximately 9:05-9:10pm my friend that was seated in the passenger seat of my truck had leaned fwd intently watching the movie when she said; "what the heck is that?" i leaned fwd to see. i saw what could've be mistaken as reflection of lights on the windshield moving left to right in other words east to west in a straight line at 45 degrees off the horizon moving fast. i saw a semi-circle of faintly lit square windows facing me, going around the object the windows were vertically arranged and horizontal to the ground like movie film wrapped around a cylinder so i couldn't see the windows on the other side. the reason i'm describing the windows so intently is because that was all i could see of the actual craft, the only reason i knew it was solid is that it blocked out the stars within the circle of windows as it passed, it matched the dark sky perfectly with no reflection, none. i then looked for heat signature as the stars reappeared there were none. when i saw this i knew it was way different than anything i'd ever seen, so i got out of my truck as fast as i could to watch and listen for noise. not a sound. nothing moves that fast without making some noise. i watched this craft fly out of sight following the faint line of windows heading west toward enterprise. i noticed during this encounter that nobody else had seen this, they were all still in there cars watching the movie, at least 200 people, incredible. it was impossible to judge altitude of the craft, my best guess was maybe 500-5000ft. the size matched a baseball in your outstretched hand at its closest to us. the shape, again best guess, was of the disk type with the ribbon of windows at its edge. now a little about myself. i've been an aviation enthusiast since i was a little boy, studied them, most all of them, built over 200 models when i was a boy, studied to be an a&p mechanic and worked as a civilian contractor for the military for 25yrs. i've seen almost everything that flies civilian and military up close and personal, i can pick out by silhouette alone 99% of everything man made that flies. my friend that was with me has been an a&p mechanic for 20yrs and has lived in this area her entire life and with ft. rucker close by can tell you by sound alone, which helicopter is flying by. i'm 47yrs old and my friend is 50yrs old, aviation has been our lives. what we saw that night was beyond anything both of us could comprehend or understand. the aircraft, or whatever it was, seemed to be pulled through the air, not pushed like it would be with engines of any known type. the only word either one of us could come up with was "incredible." there is nothing man made, that i know of, that can do what i saw done that night. we do not have that kind of technology. "incredible"
content.summary: At night saw faint glow of oncoming windows facing me same thing leaving me.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My wife, her mother and her daughter were on a tour boat off dana point, ca on march 19, 2013.  they went out to see whales and dolphins.  my wife's digital phone cam was set to 'burst' mode to capture pictures of the whales as they breached, and the dolphins as they jumped out of the water.  only after she returned home to ut and we were reviewing the photos on her phone did i notice the disc-shaped object in one of the photos.  apparently nobody noticed it at the time because they were all focused on the water.  i thought it was a joke and she had an app on her phone to insert ufo's in pictures....But it was no joke and my wife isn't even technologically savvy enough to fake the pic, nor would she have any desire to do so.  the object did not show up in any of the other photos as far as i can tell.  i'm sure it's not a seagull, airliner, frisbee, or lenticular cloud...What it is i have no idea!  please tell me what you think!
content.summary: Ufo spotted over water off dana point, ca

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:05 pm monday night. i was in the backyard with my dog and saw how clear the sky was and how bright the stars were. i watched a jet flying east to west go off in the distance and heard its engines as it moved away. i looked straight up and right where i was looking i saw two white lights in a row, very close together, one slightly smaller than the one in front of it. they were clear and looked like a jets lights from a commercial jet. but it moved incredibly fast and disappeared in a second in mid sky. it looked like it went higher and faster and then just vanished. there was no trail like from a comet and no flash and no sound. it was going north to south. i said it looked like a jet although the lights never blinked but i saw them clearly and it didn't appear to be extremely high up, no higher than a commercial jet would be. but i've never seen a jet move that fast and disappear that fast and seem to speed up. if i hadn't have looking right where it flew i wouldn't have seen it as it was gone in a second.
content.summary: I was looking up in the sky at stars and saw two lights close together one after the other, one smaller. it was clear and looked to be a jet but it moved incredibly fast and disappeared in a second like it went straight up. no sound, no trail, no flash.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving my car west to the local grocery store i noticed 6-10 orange lights that were larger than stars forming a staircase pattern going up from left to right in the western sky.

i immediately assumed it was "chinese lanterns" and traveled to my destination.  in less than 10 min i headed back to my house and attempted to locate the objects again.  they were gone.  there were no trace of them anywhere.

the lights did not flicker and i have found similar formations on the internet that looked very similar to what i saw.
content.summary: 6-10 orange lights in a staircase pattern hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my deck, smoking a cigarette and just happened to look up in the direction of the craft.  the time was approximately 10 pm.  
     
this is the 3rd time i have seen this type of object.  i did not report the first 2 because i assumed people would think i was crazy, stupid or both.  the particulars of this sighting follow:
     *)  the object is chevron shaped, v shaped, as far as i can tell. 
     *)  the object also appears to be transparent.  the only way i could really see it is as a result of                       its motion.  it had an appearance like the bottom of a glass jar while moving across the sky.   
     *)  the object appeared to be traveling at a very high rate of speed.  there was a plane, flying roughly perpendicular, at a higher altitude which allowed me some kind of baseline for speed.  in relation to that plane, this object appeared to be traveling at least twice as fast across the sky.  
     *)  the object appeared to be very large.  even though the distance between the object and i was significant and the object was hard to see due to its transparency.  i had the feeling that it was very large.  
     *)  the object flew in a straight line.  
     *)  i was very scared.  almost irrationally scared.  i remember purposefully thinking about not peeing my pants.  i still am perplexed by this reaction.  i am not a person prone to easy scares.  
     *)  strangely, i do not seem to be aware of "losing the object".  it just seemed to either stop moving, causing me to stop seeing its motion, or it just disappeared.  i did not see it fly to the horizon. i tried to reacquire the object but i could see no other motion.
content.summary: Large transparent object traveling at high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home on 91 south around the wallingford/east haven line when i noticed what i thought was a star which began moving erratically in the sky. it was hard to gauge distance, but the object was very bright, moving at a high rate of speed with sudden turns. after a few seconds of movement, the object stopped and "dropped" or fell from the sky behind the treeline. 

again, i was driving and trying to concentrate on not going off the road. i tried to keep an eye on that area/direction to see if it came up but i did not see anything after that.
content.summary: Erratic flying object stopped then fell from sky

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 04:00 hours and went downstairs for a drink, you have to walk bout 4 feet into the kitchen to turn on the light, as i opened the kitchen door and went to turn on the light i saw a red light out of the corner of my eye, so i went to the kitchen window to see what i saw or if i was going mad, then i saw another light, pulsating, on and off, so i was looking at htem and relised they was slowly moving together, paralell before i knew it there was another, random pulsating light, it was getting harderto see them as if they were going up in the sky but still moving also across the sky, i then was drawn at looking into the centre of these three lights and relised that the sky was darker in the middle of these three lights than normal, it was a solid structure im 100% sure of it, ten minutes on im stood in shock with an empty glass in the dark looking up thinking what is this thing!!! it then slowly moved  over the houses and i lost sight, it was truely out of this world, no man made object can be so large and make no noise and also keep altitude and direction
content.summary: Never seen anything like it, black triangle, dark. pulsating lights, seemed to blend in with the sky, when i studied it further i relised it was a solid object,

content.detailedDescription: It's hard to explain in words. they're all over the hudson river valley. whoever they is. we have a pretty nice telescope, it's easy to spot them if you pay close enough attention. keep your eyes peeled ;)
content.shape: Boomerang,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Shits going down in the hudson valley tonight

content.detailedDescription:
Behind the house         

i could see it in the dark it looked white

at the time i had no idea what i was looking at. i was only 7 years old at the time. i had never heard of a ufo before 

it looked like a rectangle standing on end top leaning forward a little
then the top and bottom came together then it was gone. it was over the field
just a past the house i could see the tree line under it and part of the sky.

i just stood there wondering what it was i may been a little afraid i felt my
hair bristle and a chill went up my back.

it just vanished.


i had two sitings that was inside the house one each of two different houses
in the first house was same one that i saw the ufo at.
what i saw was a white human like apparition in my bed room standing at the
foot of my bed i was very afraid of it. i moved my feet up turned on my side
and covered my head up only my noes and mouth was uncovered i was only 10 or 11 years old at the time.

the next house was about one mile from the first one i was about 14 years old
then and the  same thing took place there and i did the same thing as i did
in the first house.
content.summary: White rectagular object just aboved the field

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were walking our dogs when we noticed a star that appeared to be moving at first we thought it was a satelite but it was moving very fast then my wife noticed another moving north at the same time we noticed another traveling south it appeared to pass the one going north the color of these lights was very faint but would randomly flash very bright for a second or two but very unfrequently we witnessed 6 of these lights 2 going south two going north and one going east and then turn north and one going south east there was no noise what so ever there were military planes flying one looked to be following one of the lights going north all flying faster than sound i came inside to see if there was anything online at this time my wife looked out side and yelled at me to look at what looked like a shooting star except it was traveling up in a vertical path then dissapeared we were very excited and confused at what we were seeing still are
content.summary: Saw very faint light moving very fast then noticed another thought it was a satilite but was moving to fast saw 6 in total moving in different directions then saw what looked like a shooting star moving upward in the sky very bright

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on 3/23 to take out the trash and noticed two orange orbs in the north sky at roofline horizon.  i observed them moving together south a bit for about ten minutes, then they hovered nearly directly overhead for about ten minutes, then went quickly to the east horizon, moving together, alternating from a narrow to much wider gap between them.  they moved together in an esterly direction, when i lost track of them.  the whole sighting lasted about twenty-five minutes.  i first assumed they were planes or helicopters, but then noticed there were no flashing red, white or green lights, or noise -- and as they came directly overhead, i realized they were not anything i had seen before.  i was cautious and uncomfortable and hid behind my car to stay out of the light and to avoid their notice.  i'm still trying to figure out what it was.  they didn't act like anything i had ever seen before.  initially, i wasn't going to report this sighting, except that a friend told me a couple days later that she saw a report in fairfield, ca, a neighgoring town, that someone there also saw ten or more orange orbs (with video) on another ufo internet site.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two organge orbs from north... hovered, moving together, opening some distance, rejoined and moved quickly to east and separated by quite a distance.

content.detailedDescription:
Tucson, az.  i was taking the trash out at 8pm when i looked up in the sky and saw what i believed to be a satellite in the nw sky near the constellation cassiopeia. 

i paused to view the satellite when it suddenly changed direction at high speed, then backtracked again at high speed.  i attempted to take video with my iphone but it was too dark.  approx 2 min after watching the 1st object, a 2nd object of exact size & shape joined it, also moving at sporadic directions and speeds.  sometimes hovering for several seconds, sometimes streaking across the nw quadrant of the sky but never leaving the area around cassiopeia.  the lights appeared to interact, almost dance with one another.  it was overwhelming.  i had never seen anything like this.

there is a park in the direction of my sighting with illuminated field lights, so i tried to dismiss the lights as perhaps bats, or even high-altitude kites being illuminated by the field lights but once i called my sister (approx 5 miles away) who witnessed the same thing, i realized these had nothing to do with park-related activities. i did not lose sight of the object, but chose to come inside and report this immediately while it was stil fresh in my memory.  as of 845 pm nobody else in the local area had reported this incident.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Mistook for a satellite, changed direction abrubtly

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were headed home with are 2 daughter's,wife was pregant with our third.We were going south on rochester road coming from lakeville,as i drove soth i looked out the windsheild too the southwest. i seen a bright light like a airplane headed toward's us in a northeartern direction.I was teasing my wife that it was a ufo,she said that there is no such thing.The object was getting closer and closer and i knew it was no airplane.As the ufo approach us i looked out my windsheild and drove right under the ufo.It covered the whole sky looking throught the windsheild,at that time my whole tingle from head to toe,like when your foot falls asleep.As i drove out from underneith it the feeling quit. i pulled right onto a dirt road and got out and watch this triangle ufo just glide off to the northeast.There was no noise at all none.There were about 15 other cars stop and pulled over watch this.My wife is very religious and this is hard for her too talk about,she think's everyone think's your crazy.I seen detail on this ufo a light at each corner.Just like the ones on tv.I know that other's have seen this i was there i need to talk too someone about this sometime.The next morning my wife called her mother and told her you will not beleive this ,but we seen a ufo last night.Then her mother said that there were ufo sighting's in st.Clair shores last night,report on the news. the feeling of my whole body tingling from head to toe i will never ever forget.
content.summary: It was a huge triangle as big as a football feild or bigger,dark color with a light at each corner.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my fathers' backyard looking n/nw at the big dipper and polaris, when all of a sudden there was a bright flareup approx 10 deg w and 5 deg above polaris (north star). it lasted approx 2-3 seconds but appeared to last much longer. first it started as a small ignition, as lighting a flare, and ended with a luminous flare up before it dissipated. like a tiny sun. this was not a flare as the position was fixed, no movement at all except for the burst of light. having been in the military, i'm very familiar how flares react in the sky. it's been windy here and dusty to boot so the light/illumination was obscured by dust particles i imagine and therefore was yellowish to orange in color. this was not a moving object.
i would classify this as an astronomical event and was very excited to witness whatever this event was, possibly a novae. as a stargazer since my teens, i've witnessed many strange lights in the sky but nothing ever like this. i don't believe i will ever witness anything like this in my life again and have searched the internet to find an appropriate institution to report this to but could only find mufon to be the most reliable source to do so. i am hoping that you can forward this to the proper entity as i feel there has to be some recording of this event to confirm what i witnessed. was truly spectacular and amazing. there are no hills/mountains in the distance so it could not be far off headlights at least not for the size of the illumination that i witnessed.
after the illumination ended, i waited another 30 minutes staring at the spot where it ignited to see if it would repeat and nothing. i'm very fortunate to have witnessed this i believe.
thank you for this site and an opportunity to log my observation.
content.summary: Witnessed what i believe to a nova event, not a typical ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Hovering sphere viewed from a plane, flight dl6090 flying into jfk around 6:00pm, 16th october 2011. close to landing but still fairly high, cars were visible but small on the ground. 

i saw, looking down from above, a spherical object in the air above the ground, it was a light gray or brown colour, and either had markings or structural elements in a different shade. there were no lights, maybe a faint glow. i can't be sure of the size, it was not large. i can���t be sure if it was moving itself as the plane flew past it. i only saw it for a few seconds.

i noticed it as it was fairly close, and realized in was not on the ground, the plane fly past it.
content.summary: Hovering sphere viewed from landing plane

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving north from ajo, arizona on route 85 in a mazda convertible at about 8pm in the evening. we were returning to california from a business trip to sierra vista, arizona. after dinner in ajo we headed north.  we first observed 4 lights off to the west, they were stationary and we were familiar with the area and knew they were no on a mountain of structure.  they did gradually disappear and then reappear in the east, then disappear and re appear again in the west.  i was able to get closer to the lights when they reappeared in the west. i stopped the car and watched closely. i believed i observed smoke coming from one of the end lights.  i personally suspect that this is air force related and that what i was observing was an array of lights on an object; however i am an engineer and would expect the lights to be flashing, i would conclude that if this was for some military use that may not be the case.  i am think this may be related to the ���phoenix lights���, but i guess that is what makes the a ufo.
content.summary: A four light array, at times only 1 light and then growing to 4

content.detailedDescription:

please research about it and sure if it seen in another placess or no?
this photo wase take in malayer, hamadan, iran
my mobile is galaxy gio & it's camera is 3.2 mp.
tnx
content.summary: I was take a photo in nature. after a few second i was review the photo and saw the object.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with family member and was looking through the windshield at the stars. nothing seemed abnormal. no planes, no blinking towers, nothing. suddenly, i see a flash from one of the star like objects, which drew my attention. i caught sight of it just as it began to speed off. i just joked at the time saying, "randa, i think we just saw a ufo." but i have been thinking about it quite a bit lately... what if it was?
content.summary: Looked like a stationary star, then sped off.

content.detailedDescription: We were at our neighbors backyard star gazing. we saw several satellites and would point them out with a green laser. i had just pointed out one i found directly overhead headed south from north. it suddenly flash two times suprising everyone. very bright flashes i might add. it continued on its way south and disappeared.
content.summary: Watching satellite and it suddenly flashed at us.

content.detailedDescription:
My grandmother related this personal story to my mother while they were seated around the dining room table in about 1976.  my sister & i were in the living room and listened to the conversation as she related it to my mom.

she said that in the early 1950's when my mother was in school and her husband was at work in st. louis, she was outside hanging laundry on the clothes line.  she then related that 4 or 5 "little gray men", came down the hill toward her in the back yard.

she was frightened and ran into the house and locked the door.  she then said that they came through the walls and got her.  at this point my mother told her to shut up; that people would think that she was crazy and not to ever mention it again.  she didn't.  after my grandmother died in 1989, my mother burned her diaries.

winfield, missouri was a very rural area in the early 1950's and before many ufo sightings were prevelent.  my sister & i never talked about this event until after my grandmother's death, but wanted to share it for all that it is worth.  my grandmother would have been about 40 years of age at the time of the "incident".  this was on the old portwood road, (now hammett road), 1/2 mile off of hwy. 47, between troy and winfield.
content.summary: As told by my grandmother at dining room table around 1976.

content.detailedDescription: Hi me and a freind was getting are mail .There was a airforce jet flying around and around and then a plane came out of no way and then it just disappered right in front of are eyes it was a blue sky no clouds in the sky it was oct, my freind and i look at each other and we said did you see that and we both said yes i would take a lie detector
content.summary: My frenid and i saw a plane disappered in front of us it was a blue sky no clouds and ther was  a airfroce jet flying a aronud and a around wen the plane disapperd so did the airforce jet
